name: Gimmer_WibblyWobbly
description:
Want your main character to feel confused, drunk and/or uneasy when moving around the map? Then this is where Gimmer_WibblyWobbly shines.

Using this plugin, you can use the Plugin Command 'GetDrunk' during an event, and this will take on the parameters you've set. Use the Plugin Command 'SoberUp' to bring things back to normal!

Reminder: Gimmer_Core.js is required for this plugin to function. You can download that here.

--

Documentation is included in the README file.

Free for both commercial and non-commercial use, with credit.

- Gimmer
